JobTitle: Deal Desk Program Management Team Lead
JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for an experienced people manager to join Facebook's Deal Desk team; a part of our Partnerships Operations & Insights organization. Our team's mission is to design and optimize processes, programs, and operations to accelerate sustainable growth for Facebook’s Business Development Partnerships Teams. This role will specifically support some of Facebook’s most exciting early stage partnerships businesses, including Audience Network, WhatsApp, Workplace, Payments, and Business Messaging.In this role, you will lead a team of Program Managers, whose primary responsibilities are to design, implement and support incentive programs targeted at accelerating product and business objectives for Facebook’s emerging business units. As a team lead, your primary responsibility will be to manage and develop the careers of the individual contributors on the team, providing them with clear expectations, and enabling them to have impact at Facebook. You will also interface with leaders from across the company to develop cross-functional working relationships with Legal, Finance, Accounting, and our Partnerships Businesses. You will lead the strategic planning for new incentive programs, drive transparency and accountability through ROI analyses, and develop operating models for the team to scale in partnership with other Deal Desk pillars.  The ideal candidate will be a talented People Manager, with experience building teams in Deal Desk, Sales Operations, Finance, or Sales. This candidate will have exceptional communication, cross-functional leadership, and execution skills. Experience in the B2B SaaS ecosystem, both with direct and in-direct channels will be a significant plus.Manage, develop, and support a team of individual contributors, nurturing their careers through
